definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Some additives and preservatives are essential to keep foods quality and freshness.
sentences.chinese: 一些添加剂和防腐剂都必须保持食品的品质与鲜度。

sentences.english: In many instances, antiseptics, anti -mildew agents etc. might be added to the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 在许多情况下，配方中要加人防腐剂，防霉剂等。

sentences.english: No parabens, aluminum, propylene glycol, synthetic fragrances or harsh preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 没有苯甲酸酯，铝，丙二醇，合成香料或防腐剂苛刻。

sentences.english: The method of extracting natural preservative in aniseed(Illicium verum Hook. f. ) and its bacteriostasis were studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了八角中天然防腐剂的提取方法和抑菌作用。

sentences.english: Treated with paint, stains, creosote or other preservatives.
sentences.chinese: 用油漆，着色剂，杂酚油或其他防腐剂处理。
无添加防腐剂或者颜色。

sentences.english: You can also add 10 drops of colloidal silver as a natural preservative.
sentences.chinese: 你可以加入10滴液态胶粒银作为天然的防腐剂。

sentences.english: There are two vaccine preservatives approved for use in addition to thiomersal.
sentences.chinese: 除硫柳汞外，还有两种被批准使用的疫苗防腐剂。

sentences.english: No Atificial Flavors, No Preservatives, No Yeast or Gluten.
sentences.chinese: 不含人工调味剂，防腐剂，酵母以及谷胶蛋白。

sentences.english: You could say that nail polish is preservative free!
sentences.chinese: 你可以说指甲油是一种免费的防腐剂。

sentences.english: The ancient Egyptians prized propolis as an embalming agent.
sentences.chinese: 古埃及人将蜂胶珍视为一种防腐剂。

sentences.english: Fragrance-free, preservative-free, non-irritating, and ideal for sensitive skin.
sentences.chinese: 无香料，无防腐剂，无刺激性，非常适合敏感皮肤。

sentences.english: HKAPES said most eye-drops contained preservatives that were harmful to eyes.
sentences.chinese: 该协会说，大部分眼药水包含防腐剂，对眼睛有害。

sentences.english: Does not contain the preservative Benzalkonium CI.
sentences.chinese: 不含防腐剂苯的身份证明书。

sentences.english: Three kinds of general preservatives were selected to test for preservation of fresh sorosis of Mulberry.
sentences.chinese: 本文选用三种常用的防腐剂对桑椹进行防腐处理。

sentences.english: This is why the presence of a preservative is a regulatory requirement.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么添加防腐剂是一项管制要求。
